subject: Dave's weird code indentation
msgSnippet: What s with indenting 5 spaces?! :) I ve seen 2, 3, 4, 6 and 8, but never 5. So said Dave Astels on 3/11/2003 -------------------- ... (I replaced indentation
messageBody:
What's with indenting 5 spaces?! :)

I've seen 2, 3, 4, 6 and 8, but never 5.

So said Dave Astels on 3/11/2003 --------------------
--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "J. B. Rainsberger" <jbrains@r...> wrote:
(I replaced indentation
spaces with periods as yahoo seems not to handle leading spaces well
in my experience):

final int [] randomValues = {3, 5, 1, 2, 4, 0 };
Random fakeRandom = new Random() {
.....int index = 0;
.....public int nextInt(int n) {
.........int result = randomValues[index];
.........index = (index + 1) % randomValues.length;
.........return result;
.....}
};
aGame.orderPlayers(fakeRandom);
